site_title: Dumpling Website Preview v9 — Refined Colors
hero_subtitle: A bilingual Web3 YouTuber and cultural strategist — transforming complex blockchain ideas into accessible, story-driven education across YouTube and Twitter.
about_content: Dumpling is a bilingual Web3 educator, YouTuber, and strategist trusted by both English- and Chinese-speaking audiences. She creates deep, educational content that connects blockchain's human and cultural layers — bridging storytelling and social insight.
